title: Neurobase
description: AI-powered developer tool to query PostgreSQL and MongoDB in natural language.
details: Built modular agent-based architecture with Vercel AI SDK. Supports SQL and NoSQL with query traceability and error feedback.
problem: Developers struggle to query databases using natural language.
solution: Built an AI-powered interface with query traceability and error feedback.
impact: Improved developer efficiency by reducing time spent writing complex queries.

title: XcuseHub
description: AI-powered platform that roasts and reviews developer portfolios with brutal honesty.
details: Built a full-stack app where devs upload resumes and GitHub profiles for sarcastic, AI-generated feedback. Used Go for backend services including file parsing, API routing, and LLM interaction.
problem: Developers often lack honest feedback on their portfolios.
solution: Created a sarcastic AI reviewer that roasts portfolios and resumes.
impact: Helped devs identify weak points in their portfolio while keeping the experience fun.

title: TeamUp
description: Platform where users post gigs and apply based on matching skillsets.
details: Developed a matching system to recommend gigs by comparing user skill profiles.
problem: Freelancers struggle to find gigs that match their exact skills.
solution: Implemented a matching algorithm based on skills and gig requirements.
impact: Increased successful gig applications and reduced irrelevant matches.
